apple_vendor_description: This couple with heart emoji on Apple devices portrays two figures, one with no skin tone and the other with a medium-dark skin tone, enclosed by a vibrant heart. Apple's signature glossy 3D shading and smooth gradients give the heart a radiant glow and a sense of abundance, while the figures are rendered with soft rounded edges, symbolizing unity and love. It's a beautiful representation of a loving relationship and deep affection.
